name: Jelly Island (vauc)
description: You are stuck on a deserted island till you realise that there are cute lil jelly creatures coming out from the water. You were curious to find out what they were, until you realise that they hurt you and you need to kill them in order to survive!  Thus, you need to survive for  3 days till help arrives. Controls: WASD - Move Left Mouse Click - Shoot
